66 class QtDcmFindScuPrivate
67 {
68 
69 public:
70  QtDcmManager * manager;
71  QTcpSocket * socket;
72  int networkTimeout;
73 };
74 
75 QtDcmFindScu::QtDcmFindScu ( QObject * parent ) : d ( new QtDcmFindScuPrivate )
76 {
77  d->manager = QtDcmManager::instance();
78  d->socket = new QTcpSocket();
79  d->networkTimeout = 30;
80 }
81 
82 QtDcmFindScu::~QtDcmFindScu()
83 {
84  delete d->socket;
85  delete d;
86  d = NULL;
87 }

89 
90 void QtDcmFindScu::findPatientsScu ( QString patientName )
91 {
92  this->findPatientsScu ( patientName, "*" );
93 }
94 
95 void QtDcmFindScu::findPatientsScu ( QString patientName, QString patientSex )
96 {
97  OFList<OFString> overrideKeys;
98  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "QueryRetrieveLevel=" ) + QString ( "" "PATIENT" "" ) ).toUtf8().data() );
99  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "PatientName=" ) + patientName ).toUtf8().data() );
100 
101  //Patient leqvel
102  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "PatientID" ).toUtf8().data() );
103  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "PatientSex=" + patientSex ).toUtf8().data() );
104  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "PatientBirthDate" ).toUtf8().data() );
105 
106  doQuery ( overrideKeys, QtDcmFindCallback::PATIENT );
107 
108 }
109 
110 void QtDcmFindScu::findStudiesScu ( QString patientName )
111 {
112  this->findStudiesScu ( patientName, "*", QDate ( 1900,01,01 ).toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ),QDate::currentDate().toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ) );
113 }
114 
115 void QtDcmFindScu::findStudiesScu ( QString patientName, QString studyDescription )
116 {
117  this->findStudiesScu ( patientName, studyDescription, QDate ( 1900,01,01 ).toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ),QDate::currentDate().toString ( "yyyyMMdd" ) );
118 }
119 
120 void QtDcmFindScu::findStudiesScu ( QString patientName, QString studyDescription, QString startDate, QString endDate )
121 {
122  OFList<OFString> overrideKeys;
123  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "QueryRetrieveLevel=" ) + QString ( "" "STUDY" "" ) ).toUtf8().data() );
124  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "PatientName=" ) + patientName ).toUtf8().data() );
125  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "StudyDescription=" ) + studyDescription ).toUtf8().data() );
126  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "StudyDate=" + startDate + "-" + endDate ).toUtf8().data() );
127 
128  //Study level
129  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "StudyInstanceUID" ).toUtf8().data() );
130 
131  doQuery ( overrideKeys, QtDcmFindCallback::STUDY );
132 
133 }

135 void QtDcmFindScu::findSeriesScu ( QString patientName, QString studyUID )
136 {
137  this->findSeriesScu ( patientName, studyUID, "*", "*", "*" );
138 }

140 void QtDcmFindScu::findSeriesScu ( QString patientName, QString studyUID, QString studyDescription, QString modality )
141 {
142  this->findSeriesScu ( patientName, studyUID, studyDescription, "*", modality );
143 }
144 
145 void QtDcmFindScu::findSeriesScu ( QString patientName, QString studyUID, QString studyDescription, QString serieDescription, QString modality )
146 {
147  OFList<OFString> overrideKeys;
148  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "QueryRetrieveLevel=" ) + QString ( "" "SERIES" "" ) ).toUtf8().data() );
149  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "PatientName=" ) + patientName ).toUtf8().data() );
150  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "StudyInstanceUID=" + studyUID ).toUtf8().data() );
151  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "StudyDescription=" + studyDescription ).toUtf8().data() );
152  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "SeriesDescription=" ) + serieDescription ).toUtf8().data() );
153  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "Modality=" + modality ).toUtf8().data() );
154 
155  //Study level
156  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "StudyDate" ).toUtf8().data() );
157 
158  //Serie level
159  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "SeriesInstanceUID" ).toUtf8().data() );
160  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "InstitutionName" ).toUtf8().data() );
161  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "InstitutionAddress" ).toUtf8().data() );
162  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "PerformingPhysicianName" ).toUtf8().data() );
163  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "AcquisitionNumber" ).toUtf8().data() );
164  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "NumberOfSeriesRelatedInstances" ).toUtf8().data() );
165 
166  doQuery ( overrideKeys, QtDcmFindCallback::SERIE );
167 
168 }
169 
170 void QtDcmFindScu::findImagesScu ( QString seriesUID )
171 {
172  OFList<OFString> overrideKeys;
173  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "QueryRetrieveLevel=" ) + QString ( "" "IMAGE" "" ) ).toUtf8().data() );
174  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "SeriesInstanceUID=" + seriesUID ).toUtf8().data() );
175 
176  //Image level
177  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "SOPInstanceUID" ).toUtf8().data() );
178  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "InstanceNumber" ).toUtf8().data() );
179 
180  doQuery ( overrideKeys, QtDcmFindCallback::IMAGES );
181 
182 }
183 
184 void QtDcmFindScu::findImageScu ( QString imageUID )
185 {
186  OFList<OFString> overrideKeys;
187  overrideKeys.push_back ( ( QString ( "QueryRetrieveLevel=" ) + QString ( "" "IMAGE" "" ) ).toUtf8().data() );
188 // overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "SeriesInstanceUID=" + seriesUID ).toUtf8().data() );
189 // overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "InstanceNumber=" + instanceNumber ).toUtf8().data() );
190 
191  //Image level
192  overrideKeys.push_back ( QString ( "SOPInstanceUID="+ imageUID ).toUtf8().data() );
193 
194  doQuery ( overrideKeys, QtDcmFindCallback::IMAGE );
195 
196 }
197 
198 bool QtDcmFindScu::checkServerConnection ( int timeout )
199 {
200  bool result = true;
201  d->socket->setSocketOption ( QAbstractSocket::LowDelayOption, 1 );
202  d->socket->connectToHost ( d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getHostname(), d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getPort().toInt() );
203  if ( d->socket->waitForConnected ( timeout ) )
204  {
205  d->socket->disconnectFromHost();
206  }
207  else
208  {
209  d->manager->displayErrorMessage ( "Cannot connect to server " + d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getHostname() + " on port " + d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getPort() + " !" );
210  result = false;
211  }
212 
213  return result;
214 }
215 
216 bool QtDcmFindScu::doQuery ( OFList<OFString>& overrideKeys, QtDcmFindCallback::cbType level )
217 {
218  //Image level
219  OFList<OFString> fileNameList;
220  OFString temp_str;
221  DcmFindSCU findscu;
222 
223  // test connection
224  if ( !this->checkServerConnection(10000) )
225  return false;
226 
227  QtDcmFindCallback * callback = new QtDcmFindCallback ( level );
228 
229  if ( findscu.initializeNetwork ( d->networkTimeout ).bad() )
230  {
231  d->manager->displayErrorMessage ( tr ( "Cannot establish network connection" ) );
232  return false;
233  }
234 
235  if ( findscu.performQuery ( d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getHostname().toUtf8().data(),
236  d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getPort().toInt(),
237  QtDcmPreferences::instance()->getAetitle().toUtf8().data(),
238  d->manager->getCurrentPacs()->getAetitle().toUtf8().data(),
239  UID_FINDPatientRootQueryRetrieveInformationModel, EXS_Unknown,
240  DIMSE_BLOCKING, 0, ASC_DEFAULTMAXPDU, false, false, 1, false, -1, &overrideKeys, callback, &fileNameList ).bad() )
241  {
242  d->manager->displayErrorMessage ( tr ( "Cannot perform query C-FIND" ) );
243  }
244 
245  if ( findscu.dropNetwork().bad() )
246  d->manager->displayErrorMessage ( tr ( "Cannot drop network" ) );
247 
248  return true;
249 }
